companyName: End, Hierseman & Crain, LLC - Milwaukee, WI
description:
"The attorneys at End, Hierseman & Crain, LLC, have decades of experience handling medical malpractice and personal injury claims for people in Wisconsin. Their colleagues recognize them as skilled litigators who have a reputation for success and integrity.

It is important to recognize the pain victims and their families feel when something goes wrong while in the care of medical professionals. Explaining why an injury happened is difficult, and finding a path forward toward recovery can seem impossible. The experienced attorneys at End, Hierseman & Crain, LLC, can provide the insight and care needed to restore a sense of normalcy for victims of medical malpractice and nursing home abuse."
